short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks previous prices, predicts when the price will change and if it'll go up or down. Now with one favourites list for both shops!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to help save some money during your next trip to the supermarket! 

When you install this, and go to any product on the Coles or Woolworths sites, you'll see a red or green box in the bottom right. Red means the price is due to go up, green means the price is due to go down!

When you click the box you will see the price change history of that product (the date and the price it changed to), and you will be given some information such as the average time between changes, how long it has been since the last change, and how likely it is the that price will change tomorrow/will that change see the price go up or down? 

You can choose to add a product to the favourites list by clicking the "Add to favourites" button, and see the favourites list by clicking the one next to it. Once in the favourites list you can drag and drop items if you want, say, Corn Flakes from Coles next to Corn Flakes from Woolworths. This way you can easily see where it is currently cheapest!

Please keep in mind, I do NOT have any inside information so I cannot say with 100% certainty when prices will change but given how most of the gou...pricing is of a cyclic nature, all it takes is a bit of maths to have a really good estimate. 

This is just a hobby project. I am not a professional developer, I'm not even a computer science student - so it will not be perfect. If you find any bugs/issues, PLEASE let me know. I'm just a one man team doing this for free in my spare time so please bear with me. 

Thanks!!!
